column5: 4- bedroom 3-bath that will accommodate up to 12 each. Gorgeous property that boast convenience in every direction! Enjoy access to a cocktail pool, BBQ grills, and deck areas. The Hinmann Villas are walking distance to the Comal river/tube chute, Schlitterbahn Water park, local restaurants, Landa Park Golf course, Hinmann Island, and more!  Each villa will offer cable, internet, 5 flat screen TV's, DVD, washer/dryer, fully stocked kitchen, granite counter tops, wood floors, garden tub and furnishings that will meet all your expectations.
column8: UPSCALE VILLAS! Hinman B will meet your needs on every level! - Hinman Haus B
